content.text:
# Revolutionary People's Party (Turkey, legal)

| chairman         = Celal Özcan
| founded          =
| headquarters     = Ankara, Turkey
| ideology         = MarxismLeft-wing populismPeople's democracyAnti-imperialism
| position         = Left-wing
| country          = Turkey
}}
The '''Revolutionary People's Party (, DEV-PARTİ''') was a Marxist anti-imperialist political party in Turkey. The DEV-PARTİ was founded on 28 September 2011 and led by Celal Özcan. Party dissolved on 20 July 2017.
See also
*Revolutionary People's Party (Turkey, illegal)
